Title: Race Gurram
Writer: A. Deepakraj (screenplay), Shivgopal Krishna (hindi dialogue), Vikram Sirikonda (screenplay), Vikram Sirikonda (screenwriter), Vakkantham Vamsi, Varikuppala Yadagiri
Actors: Allu Arjun, Shruti Haasan, Shaam, Ravi Kishan
Plot: Two brothers have two different approaches to life. While one brother follows rules and regulations, the other does things his own way.
